title: AI334 and AQ806 antibodies recognize the spike S protein from SARS-CoV-2 by ELISA
author: Philippe Hammel, Anna Marchetti, Wanessa C. Lima, Kelvin Lau, Florence Pojer, David Hacker, Pierre Cosson
affiliations: Geneva Antibody Facility, Faculty of Medicine, University of Geneva, 1 rue Michel Servet, CH-1211, Geneva, Switzerland
Protein Production and Structure Core Facility, EPFL, SV, Station 19, CH-1015 Lausanne, Switzerland
abstract: Abstract We tested 10 recombinant antibodies directed against the spike S protein from SARS-CoV-1. Among them, antibodies AI334 and AQ806 detect by ELISA the spike S protein from SARS-CoV-2.
